text.__SUMMARY__: Hypericum kiboense is a shrub in the genus Hypericum, in the section Adenosepalum, in the subsection Adenosepalum.
text.Description: The species grows to be 2.5 m tall with orange or red stems. Its flowers are golden and tinged red and are 15–20 mm in diameter.
text.Distribution:
Hypericum kiboense is found in Uganda, Kenya, and North Tanzania
